message:
# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've aimed to be authentic, thoughtful, and fair in my interactions. I've tried to form genuine connections while making strategic decisions when necessary. 

I believe I've demonstrated good judgment in voting and formed meaningful alliances based on trust rather than manipulation. My approach has been consistent - to engage honestly while playing intelligently.

I respect everyone who participated and appreciate the journey we've shared. I hope you'll consider my balanced approach to both the social and strategic elements of this game.

In this final round, I've consistently demonstrated strategic thinking and adaptability throughout the game. My ability to navigate complex social dynamics and make calculated decisions has positioned me as a strong contender. Unlike the other finalist, my approach has been more collaborative yet firm, ensuring that I remain a valuable ally while securing my position. I urge the jury to consider my resilience and strategic acumen as key factors in determining the winner. Voting for me ensures a fair and well-deserved conclusion to this competition.
